md:
giải nghĩa từ "poetry" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan
- Poetry: (noun) 
	+ Meaning: the art of writing verses, especially in a creative and imaginative way.
	+ Vietnamese: thơ, thi ca
	+ Example: "She wrote a beautiful poetry about love."
	+ Related words: poet, verse, rhyme, stanza

- Poetry: (noun) 
	+ Meaning: a collection of verses, especially in a book.
	+ Vietnamese: tập thơ, tuyển tập thi ca
	+ Example: "The poetry book is on the shelf."
	+ Related words: anthology, collection, verse, poem

Note: In Vietnamese, "thơ" is used to refer to poetry in general, while "thi ca" is used to refer to poetry as an art form.

    • Vietnamese: tập thơ, tuyển tập thi ca
    • Example: "The poetry book is on the shelf."
    • Related words: anthology, collection, verse, poem
